page.title: 02EVENTS
page.content: The most major recent development in the Llandudno Junction area has been the completion of the Â£127 million section of the{North Wales Expressway from Llanddulas to Glan Conwy corner as a part of the continuing new A55 project that will link the entire North Wales coastline. The Welsh Office is now pressing ahead with plans for the{Conwy river tunnel}on which preliminary work is to start later this year(1985).A tunnel under the estuary from Llandudno Junction to Conwy Morfa was decided upon after numerous protests about a fourth bridge across the estuary that would literally dwarf the castle. {Conwy Carnival}returns on this year and will be held on Bodlondeb fields on July 13 '85 after poor weather kept crowds away one recent summer. by Paul Phillips aged 15
